contentrichtext.text: [[Image:Qa-map.PNG|thumb|310px|The cities of Qatar]] This is a '''[[list of cities]] and towns in [[Qatar]]'''. Over 90 percent of Qatari citizens live in Doha, the capital. * [[Doha]] - capital * [[AL wakair]] * [[Abu az Zuluf]] * [[Abu Thaylah]] * [[Ad Dawhah al Jadidah]] * [[Al `Arish]] * [[Al Bida` ash Sharqiyah]] * [[Al Ghanim]] * [[Al Ghuwariyah]] * [[Al Hilal al Gharbiyah]] * [[Al Hilal ash Sharqiyah]] * [[Al Hitmi]] * [[Al Jasrah]] * [[Al Jumaliyah]] * [[Al Ka`biyah]] * [[Al Khalifat]] * [[Al Khor]] * [[Al Khuwayr]] * [[Al Luqta]] * [[Al Mafjar]] * [[Al Qa`abiyah]] * [[Al Wakrah]] * [[Al `Adhbah]] * [[An Najmah]] * [[Ar Rakiyat]] * [[Al Rayyan]] * [[Ar Ru'ays]] * [[As Salatah]] * [[As Salatah al Jadidah]] * [[As Sani`]] * [[As Sawq]] * [[Ath Thaqab]] * [[Dukhan]] * [[Lusail]] * [[Ras Laffan Industrial City]] * [[Smaismah]] * [[Umm Bab]] * [[Umm Sa'id]] * [[Umm Salal Ali]] * [[Umm Salal Mohammed]] ==See also== [[Municipalities of Qatar]] {{Asia topic|List of cities in}} {{List of cities in the Middle East}} [[Category:Lists of cities by country|Qatar, List of cities in]] [[Category:Populated places in Qatar| ]] [[Category:Qatar geography-related lists|Cities]] {{Qatar-geo-stub}}
